Title: Wynton Marsalis releases debut album
Description: Marks the emergence of a major young trumpet star focused on acoustic jazz tradition.

Title: Pat Metheny releases Offramp
Description: Features pioneering use of guitar synthesizers and fusion styles.

Title: Miles Davis releases Decoy
Description: Continues to explore electric jazz-funk fusion.

Title: Branford Marsalis gains prominence
Description: Becomes a leading saxophonist in both jazz and pop contexts.

Title: Wynton Marsalis wins Grammy Awards
Description: Recognized for his contributions to jazz and classical music.

Title: Pat Metheny forms trio with Dave Holland and Roy Haynes
Michael Brecker releases solo debut
Description: The saxophonist’s album highlights his technical mastery and modern jazz approach.

Title: Wynton Marsalis founds Jazz at Lincoln Center
Description: Establishes a premier institution dedicated to jazz performance and education.

Title: Cassandra Wilson releases Blue Light ’til Dawn
Description: Merges jazz with blues and folk influences, gaining critical acclaim.

Title: John Zorn releases Naked City
Description: Experimental album blending jazz, rock, and avant-garde elements.
